6 Award Wins & 1 Award Nomination

Mainichi Film Concours - WON - Best Actress Sachiko Hidari
Kinema Junpo Awards - WON - Best Actress Sachiko Hidari

A middle class woman in Tokyo, Naoko Ishikawa lives with her husband in a shining new apartment building on a hill overlooking a slum. As her husband Eiichi becomes more entangled in his life as businessman, Naoko looks for ways to expand her own life even as her husband's life shrinks in scope and intimacy. She loses her sense of security when she becomes acquainted with poverty in her neighbourhood.
